TopicTitle: A thank you to the mod creators out there.

Articles.Content: i'd just like to say thanks to all of the mod developers out there who have already whipped up .21 patches for their mods. It's incredible the speed and efficiency of their work, and i hope that the majority of the KSP community joins me in saying thank you
4th this. Thanks for taking the time out of your busy lives.

I...errm...5th? this!

Eventually I'll get around to actually releasing a part >.> I'm having a helluva time trying uv mapping and the like.
